title: Annual performance of the Dow Jones Composite Index 2000 to 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Index value in points, with a total of 20 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately positive which exists from 2015 to 2008.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2008 to 2002.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2019 to 2017.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2017 to 2015.
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2002 to 2000.
gold: The Dow Jones Composite Index finished the year 2019 at 9,386.48 points . This is the highest point of the index in the past two decades . What is Dow Jones Composite Index ? The Dow Jones Composite Index is one of the indices from the Dow Jones index family .
